config.platforms.markdownDescription: Currently supported Git hosting platforms: GitHub, Coding, GitLab, TGit. You can customize URL templates for each platform. Available template variables: {repo:path}, {branch}, {file:path}, {file:name}, {file:dir}, {remote:url}, {remote:url:path:n} (where n is the position of the path segment, starting from 0)
config.platforms.items.urlTemplate.descr: URL template for the platform. Available variables: {repo:path}, {branch}, {file:path}, {file:name}, {file:dir}, {remote:url}, {remote:url:path:n}, etc.
config.domainRegistry.markdownDescriptio: Currently supported domains: github.com, gitlab.com, gitee.com, e.coding.net, etc.
config.domainRegistry.items.platform.des: Platform name that matches with defined platforms
config.rememberRemoteSelection.descripti: Remember the last selected remote when multiple remotes are available.
config.rememberRemoteSelection.markdownD: Remember the last selected remote when multiple remotes are available.
config.useRemoteForCodeImage.description: When creating code snippet images, use ray.so instead of local generation.
config.useRemoteForCodeImage.markdownDes: When creating code snippet images, use [ray.so](https://ray.so) instead of local generation.
